news.title: World fertility rates in 'unprecedented decline', UN says
news.summary: Hundreds of millions of people are not able to have the number of children they want, the UN warns.

news.title: Foreign Office staff told to consider resigning if they disagree over Gaza
news.summary: More than 300 Foreign Office staff had raised concerns about potential UK "complicity" in Israel's conduct in Gaza.

news.title: Teachers can use AI to save time on marking, new guidance says
news.summary: For the first time teachers in England are receiving guidelines on how they should and shouldn't use AI.

news.title: Paternity leave system is outdated and unequal, MPs say
news.summary: A report says dads should be paid 80% of earnings and allowed six weeks off work when they have a child.

news.title: Ketamine swapped for salt as smugglers exploit Europe loophole in booming market
news.summary: Crime gangs are using increasingly elaborate routes to traffic the drug across Europe to the UK, the BBC is told.

news.title: Disorder breaks out in Ballymena after alleged sexual assault of girl
news.summary: Youths with their faces masked and wearing gloves could be seen throwing objects.

news.title: Perfect storm as Trump's mass deportation drive collides with city of immigrants
news.summary: The clashes over local Ice raids come as the White House orders immigration agents to ramp up enforcement.

news.title: Everything we know about the protests
news.summary: Dozens have been arrested after clashes with officers in America's second city, with National Guard members now deployed.

news.summary: A majority of papers lead with the chancellor's U-turn on winter fuel payments for pensioners.

news.title: Sly Stone: A funky life - in pictures
news.summary: The singer and front man of Sly and the Family Stone was known for his big style and even bigger hair.
